about_the_game:
Have you ever dreamed of finding a good company for tabletop role-playing games? This time you can fully immerse yourself in erotic adventures!

EmyLiveShow: Demons & Mistresses Tale is the sequel to Dragon & Mistresses Tale – this time with a customizable main character! Meet Emy, Nia, Uma and Six face to face, get to know them better and of course roleplay an exciting fantasy story about another world-saving mission that could turn into an orgy...

EmyLiveShow: Demons & Mistresses Tale is a tabletop role-playing game themed erotic visual novel using dice rolling mechanics.

  • Create your own main character. You can choose your gender and appearance at the start of the game, but that's not all! Your choices and opinions will also affect the main character's personality and the way they are perceived by others.

  • Enjoy a variety of hot scenes for all tastes. Whether your character is participating or watching, every illustrated scene is carefully drawn by hand. For even more dynamism, we also animate all the hentai CGs in this game!

  • Follow two parallel storylines. In the midst of the plot twists, don't forget about the girls sitting at the table with you! Teaming up with one of them might be a good way to win her favor...

  • Test your luck. Dice rolls will determine the outcome of your actions, but the story will continue anyway. Sometimes it's more fun to fail than to succeed!

  • Discover Dragon & Mistresses Tale's sequel. Or start a completely new game. Familiarity with the first part is not necessary, as Demons & Mistresses Tale is told from the perspective of a new player who gradually becomes familiar with the situation. Experienced players will find some nice references, though!

The game reveals the topics of: LGBTQ+ friendly, mistress, BDSM, pet play, threesome, group sex‎, kink, masochism, sadism, sadomasochism, dominant, submissive, bondage, male dominance, male submission, female dominance, female submission, dominatrix, rough sex, masturbation, voyeurism, sexual roles‎, sex toys, oral sex, vaginal sex, anal sex, futanari

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains materials that are not suitable for all ages, not suitable for viewing at work: sex scenes, BDSM dynamics, orgasm control/denial, dubicious consent, implied non-realistic mind control, corruption, humiliation, drunk sex, violence, reckless behaviour, sex toys usage, same-sex relationships and sex, group sex, public and semi-public sex, masturbation, discussions of sex, partial and complete nudity.
Part of these events takes place in imaginary space of tabletop rpg game session.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.3
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.3
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11

name: EmyLiveShow: Demons & Mistresses Tale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3 Gen or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7400M, NVIDIA GeForce GT620M (min 2 Gb)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4 Gen or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce gtx 550 (min 2 Gb)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: A new chapter in the EmyLiveShow lewdtubers' fantasy adventures. Join the battle against the infernally hot demons or succumb to the dark seduction!
